author: cnbc.com
title: Entegris Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
BILLERICA, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Entegris , Inc. (NasdaqGS: ENTG), a leading specialty materials provider, today announced that its Board of Directors has authorized a quarterly cash dividend of $0.07 per share to be paid on May 23, 2018 to shareholders of record on the close of business on May 2, 2018.
ABOUT ENTEGRIS
Entegris is a leading specialty materials provider for the microelectronics industry and other high-tech industries. Entegris is ISO 9001 certified and has manufacturing, customer service and/or research facilities in the United States, China, France, Germany, Israel, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, South Korea and Taiwan. Additional information can be found at www.entegris.com .
.
